snippet: With advances in speech recognition, apps can turn mobile devices into powerful writing tools, without the use of a stylus or typing on a touch screen.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column observes with advances in speech recognition, apps can turn mobile devices into powerful writing tools, without the use of a stylus or typing on a touch screen.
lead_paragraph: With advances in speech recognition, apps can turn mobile devices into powerful writing tools, without the use of a stylus or typing on a touch screen.

headline.print_headline: Make a Note of It: Speech Recognition Apps Are Getting Better
